  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114080</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114080</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Induced e.m.f. across a moving conductor and cell analogy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verursachtes e.m.f. über einer beweglichen 
Leiter- und Zellenanalogie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">E.m.f. induit à travers une analogie mobile de 
conducteur et de cellules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E.m.f. induzido através de uma analogia movente 
do condutor e da pilha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">E.m.f. indotto attraverso un'analogia commovente 
delle cellule e del conduttore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκληθέν e.m.f. πέρα από μια κινούμενη αναλογία 
αγωγών και κυττάρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">E.m.f. inducido a través de una analogía móvil
del conductor y de la célula</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that a conducting wire moving downwards in a magnetic field with induced current flowing through it acts as a source of e.m.f. and is analogous to a cell.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conducting wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß eine Leitleitung, die
abwärts in ein magnetisches bewegt, mit dem geverursachten Strom 
auffangen, der es durchfließt, dient als eine Quelle von 
e.m.f. und ist analog einer Zelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre qu'un fil de conduite
descendant un champ magnétique avec le courant induit le traversant 
agit en tant que source d'e.m.f. et est analogue à une cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que um fio conduzindo
que se move para baixo em um campo magnético com a corrente induzida 
que corre através d age como uma fonte de e.m.f. e é analogous a uma
pilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che un legare di 
condotta che scende in un campo magnetico con la corrente indotta che 
lo attraversa funge da sorgente di e.m.f. ed è analogo ad una 
cellula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι ένα καλώδιο 
διεύθυνσης που κινείται προς τα κάτω σε ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο με 
την προκληθείσα παρούσα ροή της ενεργεί ως πηγή του e.m.f. και
είναι ανάλογο με ένα κύτταρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que un alambre que 
conduce que se mueve hacia abajo en un campo magnético con la 
corriente inducida que lo atraviesa actúa como fuente de e.m.f. y es 
análogo a una célula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitleitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verursachtes e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cellules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fils de conduite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant induit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">e.m.f induit.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pilhas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fios conduzindo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente induzida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">e.m.f induzido.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cellule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legare di condotta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente indotta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">e.m.f indotto.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύτταρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διεύθυνση των καλωδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προκληθέν ρεύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προκληθέν e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Células</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alambres que conducen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corriente inducida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">e.m.f inducido.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
